Package stawa.vitalstrike

package stawa.vitalstrike
VitalStrike - A Dynamic Damage Indication Plugin for Minecraft

VitalStrike enhances your Minecraft server's combat experience by providing customizable damage indicators with various features including combo systems, player statistics, and more.

Quick Links

  • GitHub Repository

Key Features

  • Customizable damage indicators with different styles and colors
  • Dynamic combo system with multipliers and ranks
  • Player combat statistics tracking
  • Per-player settings and preferences

Getting Started

To get started with VitalStrike, see the following resources:
  • Main Plugin Class
  • Player Statistics
Version:
1.5.0
Author:
Stawa

    Description
    Errors
    Centralized error handling for VitalStrike plugin Provides a hierarchy of custom exceptions for different types of errors
    Errors.CommandException
    Exception for invalid command usage
    Errors.ConfigurationException
    Exception for configuration-related errors
    Errors.DatabaseException
    Exception for database-related errors
    Errors.ErrorCode
    Enum representing different types of errors that can occur in VitalStrike
    Errors.PlayerException
    Exception for player-related errors
    Errors.UpdateException
    Exception for update-related errors
    Errors.VitalStrikeException
    Base exception for all VitalStrike errors
    HelpManager
    Manages help menu functionality for VitalStrike plugin.
    PermissionManager
    Manages permissions for VitalStrike plugin, particularly for group-based damage formats.
    PlayerManager
    Manages player preferences and settings for the VitalStrike plugin Handles loading, saving, and accessing player-specific configuration
    PlayerStats
    Manages player statistics for the VitalStrike plugin.
    PlayerStats.PlayerStatistics
    Represents a player's combat statistics.
